TopicTitle: whats up with the barn screenshots in the new ksp devnotes?

Articles.Content: am i missing something here?. last time i checked ksp was definitely not a farming sim, unless its some sort of scenery, like whats going on with kerbinside, and that would be totally boss. other than that i dont think barns go well with the large controlled explosions and not so controlled explosions of ksp

Upgradable buildings.

The barn is the level one VAB.

am i missing something here?. last time i checked ksp was definitely not a farming sim, unless its some sort of scenery, like whats going on with kerbinside, and that would be totally boss. other than that i dont think barns go well with the large controlled explosions and not so controlled explosions of ksp

The barn and other similar structures are part of a new plan to have upgradeable facilities at KSC. You start out with a barn as your VAB and other primitive structures, and as the game progresses they can be upgraded, with their final stage most likely being the buildings as you know them now.
Farm Simulator: Kerbal Edition. Can't wait until Daniel plays it.

Maybe I'm missing something, but those screenshots were from a couple weeks ago. There was such a strong response from the community that SQUAD back-peddled it's original barn plans. They haven't released any new details on what they're planning for start-up buildings now, other than the fact that Tier 1 buildings won't be ready in time for 0.90.0.

well awesome then, i like my vab the way it is now, i feel like ksp needs to try and ditch the sort of objective based gameplay for now and focus more on fixing bugs and the sandbox elements of the game (for one adding those new planets we were told about way back when)

Maybe I'm missing something, but those screenshots were from a couple weeks ago. There was such a strong response from the community that SQUAD back-peddled it's original barn plans. They haven't released any new details on what they're planning for start-up buildings now, other than the fact that Tier 1 buildings won't be ready in time for 0.90.0.

Do you have a source?

Do you have a source?

Just look for the thread that announced it. This forum, "The Daily Kerbal", then something with barns.

Also look at the devnotes that followed it a few days later.
By the way, I'm pretty sure that it was confirmed that the farm pictures were actually from an older beta, the real thing will be better quality.
Hey are you that guy that used to be a developer? The guy who made the really cool kerbal system replacer mod?
This has been extensively discussed already. Squad has already announced that those preliminary versions will be reworked. If there is anything new to be said, please post it in the original thread.
